short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily control BB live feeds with keyboard shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Control the BB live feeds video player using keyboard shortcuts and unlock new functionality such as speed control, audio control, and skip ahead by time interval.

Keyboard Shortcuts

1 - Switch to Camera 1
2 - Switch to Camera 2
3 - Switch to Camera 3
4 - Switch to Camera 4
5 / Q - Switch to Quad View

F - Toggle Fullscreen
T - Toggle Theater Mode
P - Launch Picture-In-Picture

Space / K - Play / Pause
Left Arrow - Skip Back 30 Sec
Right Arrow - Skip Forward 30 Sec

Up Arrow - Volume Up
Down Arrow - Volume Down
M - Mute / Unmute
[ - Left Audio
] - Right Audio
\ - Stereo Audio

G - Skip Back 1 Day
H - Skip Back 1 Hour
J - Skip Back 5 Min
K - Play / Pause
L - Skip Forward 5 Min
; - Skip Forward 1 Hour
' - Skip Forward 1 Day

< / , - Decrease Playback Speed
> / . - Increase Playback Speed
/ / ? - Set Playback Speed to 1.00x
